The Ceph revolution: delivering enterprise-grade storage networks with open sour
Trilha: Administração - Administração de Sistemas
Autores:
Christian Kiko Reis
Apresentação:
Dia 13 às 13:00 na sala 41E (60 minutos)  vídeo
Descrição:  The Ceph revolution: delivering enterprise-grade storage networks with open source and hardware you already have. Ceph is open source storage software  . Ceph can be used with commodity, everyday hardware to deliver enterprise-grade storage at low-cost, highly available, highly resilient. This presentation will show how it works, what it can do and why it's the best option for serving storage today.
title: The Ceph revolution delivering enterprise grade storage networks with open sour
